content: Toward the end of today's call (recording) @Kris Dekeyser (KU Leuven) and I had a fairly robust discussion about how to communicate our roadmap.
We have one at https://ct.gdcc.io but it's toward the bottom (because I moved the meetings up recently) and it's based on our old proposal with milestones A, B, C. etc.
As I said, I'm definitely opening to changing things. All ideas are welcome.
One thing I'm wondering is how much granularity we want on the roadmap.
Also, I assume we should just hard code stuff rather than trying for any kind of fancy automation.

I'm thinking it should stay high level like:

  • get images ready for production
  • improve documentation
    • demo use case
    • production use case
I don't know. Just ideas. :grinning: What do YOU think?
